issue.title: [FCD] Clock related operations exception specifications conflict
issue.discussion:
Addresses CH-25
Clock related operations are currently not required not to throw. So "Throws: Nothing." is not always true.
issue.resolution: Either require clock related operations not to throw (in 20.10) or change the Throws clauses in 30.3.2. Also possibly add a note that abs_time in the past or negative rel_time is allowed.
